TextBlock.Text: SPIRE: Who dropped the <color=orange>scroll of forbidden knowledge</color> into the pool?! I was told the Nomai who came before had left sacred knowledge that would allow us to <color=orange>breeze through the trial in record time</color> on that scroll!
CONOY: I told you it was wise to study regardless of that rumor.. Now, your saving grace is fiercely guarded by the lifeform's electrifying tentacles.
CONOY: Shall I attempt the trial first, then? I would prefer not to wait my turn after you, when I know you haven't studied!
SPIRE: You'll have to wait for me afterwards regardless, Conoy: we came on the same shuttle! Don't you dare leave me stranded here!

SPIRE: I bet it was Bells! She must have heard there was a scroll with <color=orange>forbidden knowledge that made the trial too easy,</color> and cast it into the bottom of the pool to hide it away...

CONOY: Or perhaps someone simply dropped it into the pool by accident. Regardless, <color=orange>until the tentacled lifeform rises from its cozy roost</color> above that scroll, it won't be possible to retrieve it.
